The Gossulg portal can be inscribed to the notary

Alexandra Ivanova♪21.02.2024 at 14:030
The Gossulg portal can be inscribed to the notary. The Russians can now be inscribed to the notary online. The service only allows us to choose a specialist, but also to send the necessary documents in advance. It'll save time at the reception! Record to the notary at https://gosuslugi.ru/600771/1/form details of the services https://www.gosuslugi.ru/help/faq/notary/102751
Find out more.

In the Volj, in the run-up to the elections, the members of the OIC began a campaign of house-to-doors

Elena Dunushkin♪20.02.2024 in 19:070
In the Wolzhsky, as in all the other cities of our country, representatives of the local electoral commissions began to visit their apartments from 17 February. The aim is to inform the inhabitants of the forthcoming elections of the President of the Russian Federation to be held...
Find out more.

The vocal cazaki collects humanitarian assistance for SSS participants

Ludmila Dmitrieva♪20.02.2024 at 17:040
The All-Indigenous People ' s Republic of Korea has announced the collection of humanitarian assistance for SSS participants. It is planned to send the 2024th in late February to the conferencing area. Helping Rodine's advocates and contributing to...
Find out more.

Thousands of renovated and built schools: One Russia and the Ministry of Education presented the results of the presidential programmes

Michael Potapov♪20.02.2024 at 17:010
Their implementation in the regions, together with the party ' s representatives, is supervised by the parent headquarters, and the implementation of presidential capital programmes for existing and new schools and kindergartens has been discussed with the regions at the federal headquarters by Secretary Gensovette, " One Russia " Andrei...
Find out more.

The residents of the Volgograd region participate in the " All Family " project.

Darya Iveleva♪20.02.2024 at 16:030
Already over 2,500 families from the Volgograd region have become active participants in the entire Russian Family Action, initiated by the public organization I help children. To participate in the project, it is necessary to register at < https://ames.rf/ > and to perform weekly. ...
Find out more.

Mail changed the schedule of work in Volgograd and Volgeski for the February 2024 holidays

Sergei Borodin♪20.02.2024 at 14:390
The schedule of postal offices in Volgograd, Volga and the whole area will change with the celebration of Father ' s Day in 2024. According to the Wolzh's truth in the Wolgograd Spokes Service, Friday, 23 February 2024...
Find out more.

Discounters or supermarkets, are you wearing your hats or going?

Declaration♪20.02.2024 at 12:410
The dilemma of where to go for the products - to the supermarket or discounter - many buyers are increasingly allowed for the second. Low price mags have ceased to be associated with exclusive sales points for the poor. The reasonable consumption trend...
Find out more.
